system.wet.libs.base.Wet_base

type
class
Base object attempts to set the essential variables and normalise code for PHP and Neko Base is a Singleton

Static Variables

cache_path : String

datastore_path : String

root_directory : String

views_path : String

Static Methods

echo(m : Dynamic) : Void

Cross-platform function Utility function for all classs to echo to SCREEN! This function is not to be confused with cache/buffer As it has no idea if the headers have been sent.

get_file_content(fullpath : String) : String

Cross platform function to load a file

get_full_path() : String

Cross-platform function The root directory of the host. (Subject to CHROOT jail, of course)

get_instance() : Wet_base

Load a view

get_param_string() : String

Cross-platform function The parameters as sent in the request

get_referrer() : String

Cross-platform function returns a string (sent by the browser in the REQUEST header Indicating where the current request originated. or NULL if the string is not present

load_view(view : String) : Void

set_cookie(key : String, value : String, ?expire : Date, ?domain : String, ?path : String, ?secure : Bool) : Void

Cross platform function to send a cookie

set_header(header : String, value : String) : Void

Cross platform function to send an HTTP header

set_return_code(r : Int) : Void

Cross platform function to send an HTTP return code

Constructor

new()
